name: YOUTH ORGANISATION ALEXIS PRILEP
goal:
Our mission

We aim to promote social inclusion and improve the skills of young people with fewer opportunities through their participation in the decision-making process towards a more effective impact through tolerance and raising awareness about the psychological concept of society, the fundamental rights and equity through education in the EU.

How we work

We organise and represent youth work and youth activities with young people and young adults as a way to encourage them to speak openly and develop an understanding of educational information for active citizenship with activities in which the main theme is: awareness, gender equality, languages, cinema and creativity, remembrance, solidarity and social inclusion, diversity and equality.

Goal

Our goal is to encourage the strengthening and recognition of the skills of young people in society through education for youth work. The educational set of young people is improving by providing knowledge about personal and social competences, competent cognitive and creative experiences that effectively reflect their values, priorities, and objectives.
interests: Budget, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives:
• Young people and decision-makers in a dialogue
Active citizenship, democracy, solidarity and fundamental rights
• Civic and democratic participation of young people at EU level
• Equal opportunities, life perspectives and a sense of social purpose, freedom of expression and building peaceful communities
